ResearchProjectDef.label: GlitterNet Hubs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our researchers have imagined a system capable of processing massive amounts of data, in order to improve the efficiency of various systems. They've taken to calling it the GlitterNet, since all Glitterworlds have something similar. Research must be done to figure out the details of implementing it, but the system could increase our efficiency greatly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved GlitterNet Processors
ResearchProjectDef.description: In order to process the data generated by the GlitterNet system, we need to develop more advanced processing units capable of the task.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced GlitterNet Processors
ResearchProjectDef.description: While our current current GlitterNet processors are fairly fast, further research would allow us to create even more powerful processing units. Actually building such processors, however, might be prohibitively expensive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Specialized Efficiency Processor
ResearchProjectDef.description: A specialized GlitterNet efficiency processor capable of utilizing excess processing power would increase the efficiency of the entire network.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Specialized Overdrive Processor
ResearchProjectDef.description: A specialized GlitterNet overdrive processor capable of maximizing the efficiency of integrators, at the cost of increased processor usage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Specialized Concurrency Processor
ResearchProjectDef.description: A specialized GlitterNet concurrency processor would allow us to run more integrators in parallel on one building.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Specialized Overhead Processor
ResearchProjectDef.description: A specialized GlitterNet overhead processor would allow us decrease wasted FLOPS in a connected network, leading to a higher amount of usable FLOPS.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic GlitterNet Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Though we now have the ability to create basic infrastructure for the GlitterNet system, we cannot integrate it into our systems without additional research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Medical Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into dyanmic drug infusion will allow us to build improved versions of the medical integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Medical Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into automated surgical procedures will allow us to build advanced versions of the medical integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Research Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into automated experimental analysis will allow us to build improved versions of the research integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Research Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into machine inferencing will allow us to build advanced versions of the research integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Power Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into real-time current usage monitoring will allow us to build improved versions of the power integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Power Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into waste energy recapturing will allow us to build advanced versions of the power integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Bed Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into automated firmness adjustment will allow us to build improved versions of the bed integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Bed Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into integrated temperature sinks will allow us to build advanced versions of the bed integrator, and have the comfiest night's sleep ever.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Workspeed Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into industrial sensing packages will allow us to build improved versions of the workspeed integrator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Workspeed Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into algorithmic preprocessing will allow us to build advanced versions of the workspeed integrator.
